entry.title: [EU/CA][Customer service] API unreachable
entry.content:
Oct 30, 14:15 UTC
Resolved - A fix has been implemented.
OVHcloud API is reachable again.

Parent Incident : [Global][Infrastructure] - Backbone incident notification

Oct 30, 13:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 30/10/2024 13:23 UTC
Service impact: OVHcloud API is temporarily unreachable impacting services management from Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
This has no impact on your infrastructures health.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Support ticketing tool maintenance
entry.content:
Oct 29, 23:15 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 29, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 8, 14:46 UTC
Update - Please be advised that the scheduled maintenance operation has been rescheduled.
Please find the revised calendar below:

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 29/10/2024 22:00 UTC
End time : 29/10/2024 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers won't be able to create tickets for 1 hour during the maintenance
Service improvement : We need to implement a maintenance to improve the stability of our support ticketing tool.
Workaround : Support will still be reachable via Phone and LiveChat.

You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Corporate websites] - OVHcloud community forum migration notification
entry.content:
Sep 5, 08:39 UTC
Completed - Please be advised that the scheduled maintenance operations have been postponed. A revised schedule will be issued in advance of the next maintenance window.

Sep 4, 17:47 UTC
Update - Operations on this maintenance will take longer than expected.
Update will be posted when operations are done

Sep 4, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 27, 15:16 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on OVHcloud community forum.

This may temporarily affect functionality.

Start time : 04/09/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 04/09/2024 23:59 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud community forum will be in read only mode during the migration.
Service improvement : In order to improve customer experience, we will migrate our OVHcloud community forum to a new platform (community.ovhcloud.com).

Our technical team ensure a smooth and seamless transition.
However, to perform some technical operations, the OVHcloud community forum will be in read only mode during the migration for all day

We understand that this may cause some inconvenience, and we appreciate your understanding and patience during this time.

entry.title: [India][Support] - Support unreachable by phone
entry.content:
Jul 17, 07:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/07/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2024 07:17 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a problem on our operator side.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 17, 06:24 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jul 17, 04:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/07/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Support is temporarily unavailable by phone in India. This issue only affects Airtel.
Jio and Vodafone are working normally.
Workaround : Customers can come into support using Chat or dial 000 800 040 4567 from another telecom provider like Jio or Vodafone.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
